entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-acm-request-certificate
entry.content: Terraform module to request an ACM certificate for a domain name and create a CNAME record in the DNS zone to complete certificate validation

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-alb
entry.content: Terraform module to provision a standard ALB for HTTP/HTTP traffic

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-cloudfront-cdn
entry.content: Terraform Module that implements a CloudFront Distribution (CDN) for a custom origin.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-cloudfront-s3-cdn
entry.content: Terraform module to easily provision CloudFront CDN backed by an S3 origin

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-codebuild
entry.content: Terraform Module to easily leverage AWS CodeBuild for Continuous Integration

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-elasticache-redis
entry.content: Terraform module to provision an ElastiCache Redis Cluster

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-s3-bucket
entry.content: Terraform module that creates an S3 bucket with an optional IAM user for external CI/CD systems

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-s3-log-storage
entry.content: This module creates an S3 bucket suitable for receiving logs from other AWS services such as S3, CloudFront, and CloudTrail

entry.content: Optimized and Maintenance-free Kubernetes on Hetzner Cloud in one command!
